item.title: The Awards Season Gamble: Why Festival Strategy Can Make or Break Oscar Dreams
item.description: For Hollywood studios eyeing Oscar gold, deciding where to premiere a film is one of the season’s most crucial strategic choices. The right debut at the right festival can generate months of positive
